title: Beautifully remodeled contemporary home with in-law suite
posting_body: Excellent 20-year home located in desirable newer home community in Union City;
House is extensively renovated with new kitchen, new baths, new water proof vinyl plank and luxury Berber carpet flooring, all new plumbing, new lighting, etc.
Soaring cathedral ceiling with elegant chandeliers to welcome you to the formal living room and dining room
Delightful color of fresh paint with custom 2-tone
Great floor-plan featuring 5 bedrooms, 3.5 baths with vaulted ceiling in primary / owner's suite
Open loft and 4 bedrooms on the 2nd floor;
Separate family room with fireplace and natural lights shine through multiple windows
A cozy breakfast nook looking out to the maintenance backyard;
Gourmet kitchen features contemporary granite countertops and white cabinets, stainless steel appliances, and a central island with barstool countertop;
Bathrooms with all new countertops, white cabinets, custom-made mirrors / shower doors;
Convenient commuter friendly location, close to BART and bridge/highways.
Contact me directly if you're interested in seeing this home.
